des: "A Memphis style rub that I use primarily on pork butts and ribs prior to smoking. I usually coat the meat with the rub and let rest 24 to 48 hours wrapped in plastic wrap. I then sprinkle a light second application immediately before putting the meat into the smoker. Store in an airtight container in a cool, dark place."
ins: Whisk paprika, chili powder, turbinado sugar, salt, garlic powder, cumin, oregano, thyme, celery salt, black pepper, mustard, onion powder, and cayenne pepper together in a bowl.
